title: XmingPortablePuttySessions.Watcher.StartWatching() failed: 'sessions' does not exist.
author: vivekvemula1
body_snippet:
<!--- Provide a general summary of the issue in the Title above -->
I am trying to launch MRemoteNg and it is crashing (closing the application soon after the launch). I am using mRemoteNG-Installer-1.76.20.24615.msi

Error: 

2024-01-17 11:04:02,735 [1] WARN  - XmingPortablePuttySessions.Watcher.StartWatching() failed: 'sessions' does not exist.
2024-01-17 11:04:52,037 [1] INFO  - mRemoteNG 1.76.20.24615 starting.
2024-01-17 11:04:52,040 [1] INFO  - Command Line: C:\Program Files (x86)\m...

comments.author: Kvarkas
comments.snippet: look like its not able to access config files for some reason, "Loading External Apps failed: Could not FIND file!" could you try to check if mR have write permissions in that folder?

comments.author: robertpopa22
comments.snippet:
Triage refresh (P4 version-label debt): this issue is tagged with legacy version labels. Please retest on the latest build (fork v1.79.x or upstream dev), then share reproducible steps and expected vs actual behavior. If still valid, keep open and relabel to current triage scope (for example Need 2 check). If fixed, close with resolution.

Current legacy version labels: 1.76.20
